Html:
While updating my DataGrid code and templates from the CTP to V1 I noticed that DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter was moved from Microsoft.Windows.Controls to Microsoft.Windows.Controls.Primitives, which I expected since we have to add Imports System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.  The problem is I've done quite a bit of templating with the CTP and in the CTP DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter had a property called SourceScrollViewerName.  SourceScrollViewerName does not exist for the DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter in the V1 release.  Any ideas short of creating all of my templates again?

Kindest regards,
-LT
fyi, if anyone runs into the same issue, just remove SourceScrollViewerName from your XAML, it's no longer needed.
